Ward–Lose 5 life.
[i]Bolganone[/i] – When Saias, Bishop of Flame enters, he deals 3 damage to each creature.
[i][i]Rally[/i] Spectrum[/i] – At the beginning of each combat, until end of turn, target creature you control gets +1/+1 for each of its colors, then if its red, it gains trample, and if its white, it gains lifelink.
[i]Silence[/i] – During your turn, your opponents can't cast spells or activate abilities of nonland permanents they control.
